DOC.brief_summary: This study design examine efficacy safety 2 dose level weekly subcutaneously inject albiglutide compare placebo open label reference arm daily subcutaneous injection liraglutide , Japanese subject Type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: A Monotherapy Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety 2 Dose Levels Albiglutide Japanese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM )
DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus , treat diet exercise stable dose 1 OAD screen Body mass index ( BMI ) 17 40 kg/ m^2 inclusive Subjects OAD naïve , HbA1c 7.0 % 10.0 % Screening Visit 2 ; subject enter study 1 OAD , HbA1c 6.5 % 9.5 % Screening HbA1c 7.0 % 10.0 % Visit 2 Creatinine clearance > 30 mL/min ( calculate use CockcroftGault formula ) History type 1 diabetes mellitus •Female subject pregnant , lactating , < 6 week postpartum• Clinically significant cardiovascular and/or cerebrovascular disease Current ongoing symptomatic biliary disease , clinical sign symptom pancreatitis , history chronic acute pancreatitis , determine investigator Serum amylase > =3 ×ULN and/or serum lipase > =2 × ULN and/or subject experience symptom possibly relate pancreatitis Prior use TZD GLP1R agonist within 4 month Screening
